content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for showing interest in the apartment. As the landlord, I would like to ensure that I am getting the best possible price for the property. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am not sure yet. Can you tell me more about the location and amenities of the apartment?
name: Mary Smith

content: Certainly! The apartment is located in the heart of the city, just a short walk away from major shopping centers, restaurants, and public transportation. It also has access to a shared courtyard and laundry facilities. The apartment comes fully furnished, including a kitchen with appliances, a comfortable living area, and a cozy bedroom. Does this information help you in determining your budget for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, it does. Based on the location and amenities, I am willing to pay up to 750 Euros per month for the apartment.

However, I would like to negotiate with you to see if we can come to an agreement on a lower rental price. How does 650 Euros sound?

I agree to the price of 650 Euros per month.
name: Mary Smith

content:
Thank you for your offer of 650 Euros per month. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am afraid that I am unable to accept this price. The location and amenities of the apartment, as well as the size and condition of the property, warrant a higher rental price.

I would be happy to discuss further if you have any other questions or concerns. Otherwise, I will need to decline your offer and end the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
